name: Wasp Nest Simulation Full
description:
Establish a wasp colony. This 3D survival game will set you into a realistic simulation of the insect world. Expire adventures from the perspective of a tiny wasp and discover a huge detailed habitat popolated by diffrent kinds of other insects.

Search for food resources in order to feed the wasp queen. But beware of huge spiders and praying mantises that are ill-disposed to your wasp colony. After the required amount of food, the queen will lay eggs that evolve to lavae. Supply them with food so that they can pupate in order to transform to a new wasp.

Enforce attacks to overwhelm larger insects with the power of the swarm and collect protein pieces of dead insects. To control the worker wasps you can command them diretcly or create by pheromones trails.
Enlarge the wasp nest. Dig tunnels and huge chambers.

Wasp Nest Simulator Full
- very realistic ant behaviour ( pheromone communication)
- explore a detailed and huge natural ant habitat
- forest environment, different plants, realistic textures
- other insects: spiders, praying mantis, scorpions etc.
- attack and fight against enemy insects
-overwhelm them with the power of the swarm
- collect food in the form of fruit or sugar to feed the queen and lavae
- first person, easy touch control
- build a huge underground nest
->enlarge the ant hill - dig chambers
- play as wasp queen, drone and princess wasp
- 2 wasp species (european wasp, hornet)
- start with custom colony size
- sandbox mode
